about_the_game:
Gravity Ball is a fast-paced online multiplayer game where players can team up for a supercharged, futuristic experience with unconventional rules and a unique competitive thrill. NBA 2K25 players can download Gravity Ball for free by accessing the Gravity Ball building in The City.

Choose to compete in 3v3 or 5v5 formats, before entering an arena-like dome with your teammates. Work together to maintain possession and weave your way through defenders, as you take aim at a series of numbered targets and try to score. Utilize Power-Ups to gain an advantage and overpower the rival squad in this madcap contest.

Play your way as you traverse the multi-tiered playing field and succeed with new strategies in this innovative sport at the heart of The City.
